member.name: T:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearches
member.summary: Used to access Search Indexes at Cloudant.

member.name: M:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearches.SearchAsync(MyCouch.Cloudant.Requests.SearchIndexRequest)
member.summary: Lets you perform a search using Cloudants Lucene powered Search API by using a reusable . Any returned IncludedDoc will be treated as JSON.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.IMyCouchCloudantClient.Searches
member.summary: Used to access Search Indexes at Cloudant.

member.name: T:MyCouch.Cloudant.IMyCouchCloudantServerClient
member.summary: Connects to a server instance rather than a DB instance as or does.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.IMyCouchCloudantServerClient.Security
member.summary: Used to access Security features with Cloudant.

member.name: T:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters
member.summary: The different common search parameters that can be specified when performing a query against a Search-index.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.IndexIdentity
member.summary: Identitfies the Search index that this request will be performed against.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.Expression
member.summary: The Lucene expression that will be used to query the index.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.Stale
member.summary: Allow the results from a stale search index to be used.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.Bookmark
member.summary: A bookmark that was received from a previous search. This allows you to page through the results. If there are no more results after the bookmark, you will get a response with an empty rows array and the same bookmark. That way you can determine that you have reached the end of the result list.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.Sort
member.summary: Sort expressions used to sort the output.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.IncludeDocs
member.summary: Include the full content of the documents in the return.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.Limit
member.summary: Limit the number of the returned documents to the specified number.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.Ranges
member.summary: Defines ranges for faceted numeric search fields.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.Counts
member.summary: List of field names for which counts should be produced.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.GroupField
member.summary: Field by which to group search matches.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.GroupLimit
member.summary: Maximum group count. This field can only be used if group_field is specified.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.GroupSort
member.summary: This field defines the order of the groups in a search using group_field. The default sort order is relevance.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.ISearchParameters.DrillDown
member.summary: Defines a pair of field name and value so that search only matches documents that that have the given value in the field name.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.Requests.SearchIndexRequest.IndexIdentity
member.summary: Identitfies the Search index that this request will be performed against.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Cloudant.Requests.SearchIndexRequest.Expression
member.summary: The Lucene expression that will be used to query the index.

member.summary: Allow the results from a stale search index to be used.
